data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Jinja, Uganda to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jinja, Uganda

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Jinja to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 60,264 believers in Jinja, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Jinja, Uganda, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Aringa people might believe through him.
God, we pray both the men and women of Jinja, Uganda will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Jinja, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jinja, Uganda has a population of 181,800.

We estimate Jinja has 60,264 people who might know Jesus, 90,786 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 30,750 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 30,750 lost people in  Jinja, Uganda have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

location.name: Jinja
location.people_groups_list: Karamojong, Kaliko, Nubian, Mvuba, Kalenjin, Pokot
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Karamojong (849,000), Kaliko (13,000), Nubian (37,000), Mvuba (1,200), Kalenjin, Pokot (134,000)
